quote: When you laugh at yourself, you gain perspective. Then you realize that the mistakes you made, as long as they didn't hurt anyone but yourself——well, you can forgive yourself for those.
quote_letters: WHEN YOU LAUGH AT YOURSELF YOU GAIN PERSPECTIVE THEN YOU REALIZE THAT THE MISTAKES YOU MADE AS LONG AS THEY DIDNT HURT ANYONE BUT YOURSELF--WELL YOU CAN FORGIVE YOURSELF FOR THOSE
